description: A list of weapon's from Subhaven's Endgame Excel sheet. Found at https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1xdIOR1LTkjKM-eZ8r-r2StiWdMWeja2uEZA1yfsG90c/edit?gid=2137039658#gid=2137039658
name: Subhaven Picks

data.description: Exceptional traits. Near 100% uptime of your damage perks makes this a great pick for an energy special weapon user.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Exceptional traits. Near 100% uptime of your damage perks makes this a great pick for an energy special weapon user.
data.name: (Foil) Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Exceptional traits. Great for Solar 3.0 builds - very high damage per shot with Explosive Rounds and One for All. One for All is a great perk in high level content, just remember to quickly tag 3 enemies - Explosive Rounds helps with this.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Exceptional traits. Great for Solar 3.0 builds - very high damage per shot with Explosive Rounds and One for All. One for All is a great perk in high level content, just remember to quickly tag 3 enemies - Explosive Rounds helps with this.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Great Volatile workhorse scout, especially with Gyrfalcon. Explosive Rounds and One for All have great synergy.
data.name: Volatile

data.description: Great Volatile workhorse scout, especially with Gyrfalcon. Explosive Rounds and One for All have great synergy.
data.name: Volatile

data.description: Workhorse Arc SMG for your Arc 3.0 builds. Great alternative to the Surrounded IKELOS SMG with synergising perks.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Solar SMG for your Solar 3.0 builds. Great for extending Restoration and Radiant. Threat Detector + Surrounded are great if you can live - excellent for farming spawn doors. Incandescent kills spread scorch, killing scorched targets creates a Sunspot on Titan.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Workhorse Void SMG for your Void 3.0 builds, exceptional with Controlled Demolition on Titan, or Gyrfalcon on Hunter. Stats for All + One for All is a great perk combo in high level content, just remember to quickly tag 3 enemies. Armor-Piercing Rounds enables 1x overpenetration, which helps with activating perks.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Kinetic slot rapid fire fusion. Fusions are great on targets that are difficult or impossible to crit (Wyverns, Primarily shielded majors, etc.).
data.name: Charge Time Masterwork + Quick Access Sling

data.description: Very useful mobility tool, and great no crit major clear.
data.name: Handling Masterwork + Quick Access Sling

data.description: Very useful mobility tool, and great no crit major clear.
data.name: Handling Masterwork + Quick Access Sling

data.description: One of the best add. clear specials in the game. Ambitious Assassin on a wave frame Grenade Launcher is great, and Chain Reaction clears rooms.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Quick Access Sling

data.description: One of the best add. clear specials in the game. Ambitious Assassin on a wave frame Grenade Launcher is great, and Chain Reaction clears rooms.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Quick Access Sling

data.name: Reload Masterwork + Quick Access Sling

data.description: Made for double-slug damage. Also great for killing the occasional healthy target with recombination.
data.name: Handling Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Great choice for swapping to a double special loadout while keeping add. clear. Good ammo econ & damage output.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Quick Access Sling

data.description: Great choice for swapping to a double special loadout while keeping add. clear. Good ammo econ & damage output.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Great for deleting that one Major target that spawns every so often (e.g. Acquisition encounter); essentially a legendary rarity Izanagi for this purpose.
data.name: Handling Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Great for deleting that one Major target that spawns every so often (e.g. Acquisition encounter); essentially a legendary rarity Izanagi for this purpose.

data.description: Great for deleting that one Major target that spawns every so often (e.g. Acquisition encounter); essentially a legendary rarity Izanagi for this purpose.
data.name: Handling Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Excellent DPS but no ammo generating perk means low total damage.
data.name: Handling Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: A great grenade launcher, however expect the trend of a trials release to be followed up with a better or craftable version to continue. Exceptional DPS.
data.name: Velocity Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: A great grenade launcher, however expect the trend of a trials release to be followed up with a better or craftable version to continue. Exceptional DPS.
data.name: Velocity Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: This is the follow-up to Cataphract we've been expecting. Best GL available. Exceptional DPS.
data.name: Velocity Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: This is the follow-up to Cataphract we've been expecting. Best GL available. Exceptional DPS.
data.name: Velocity Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: In my opinion this is the best arc MG in the game for add. clear. Subsistence + One for All gives Machine Guns great damage and mag uptime.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: In my opinion this is the best solar MG in the game for add. clear. Subsistence + One for All gives Machine Guns great damage and mag uptime. Great for extending Solar buffs with Empyrean.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: The best add. clear weapon in the game, hands down. On a Gyrfalcon's hunter you can solo clear Master Raid encounter rooms full of adds, while your team does whatever they want.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: The best add. clear weapon in the game, hands down. On a Gyrfalcon's hunter you can solo clear Master Raid encounter rooms full of adds, while your team does whatever they want.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Not the best DPS by any means, but servicable as an incredibly high total-damage weapon, with the added benefit of being able to clear adds too.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Excellent as a swapping weapon with Reconstruction; two in the mag to start damage with Izanagi -> Radiant Dance Machines is a lot of DPM. Mastering Slideways resetsis great fun, whether using multiple slideways weapons or Izanagi; although not meta.
data.name: Handling Masterwork + Quick Access Sling

data.description: Clown Cartridge is a good default DPS pick - it requires no thought. Surrounded is the one of the highest damage traits on a rocket. Also comes with Slideways for some interesting damage potential. World drops are a pain to farm - a good alternative is The Hothead.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Quick Access Sling

data.description: Exceptional, especially with Ballidorse. Highest non-niche burst in the game, unfortunately somewhat painful to farm. Worth it anyway. Envious Assassin + Restoration Ritual lets you shoot a comical amount of rockets without reloading, all with the Bait and Switch damage buff.
data.name: Handling Masterwork + Quick Access Sling

data.description: Arc bow for Champion stuns and Arc shields.
data.name: Draw Time Masterwork + Quick Access Sling

data.description: Solar bow for Champion stuns and Solar shields.
data.name: Draw Time Masterwork + Quick Access Sling

data.description: Solar bow for Champion stuns and Solar shields.
data.name: Draw Time Masterwork + Quick Access Sling

data.description: Solar bow for Champion stuns and Solar shields.
data.name: Draw Time Masterwork + Quick Access Sling

data.description: Solar bow for Champion stuns and Solar shields.
data.name: Draw Time Masterwork + Quick Access Sling

data.description: Void bow for Champion stuns and Solar shields. Works well with Volatile Rounds.
data.name: Draw Time Masterwork + Quick Access Sling

data.description: Most on-hit traits on an Arc 140, with nice utility perks in the left column. One for All is a great perk in high level content, just remember to quickly tag 3 enemies.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: This may surprise you. Enhanced Subsistence with a mag increase will load four (4) rounds per kill. Stats for All & One for All is great in harder content. Great with Gyrfalcons. The over-penetration with Seraph Rounds helps One for All & Volatile.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Probably the highest damage perk combination we've seen on a Legandary Primary since Kindled Orchid in Season 5. Chews through Red bars in GMs compared to other pulses.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Probably the highest damage perk combination we've seen on a Legandary Primary since Kindled Orchid in Season 5. Chews through Red bars in GMs compared to other pulses.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Excellent synergy with Dragonfly and One for All. Big damage with decent AoE on a weapon great for Arc builds. Hard to ask for more.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Back Up Mag

data.description: Excellent synergy with Dragonfly and One for All. Big damage with decent AoE on a weapon great for Arc builds. Hard to ask for more.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Great Solar pulse. The synergy between Stats & One for All needs no explaination.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Decent Kinetic slot alternative to Perses-D, with OFA and the +10% Kinetic boost.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Decent Kinetic slot alternative to Perses-D, with OFA and the +10% Kinetic boost.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Arc SMG for your Arc 3.0 builds. Threat Detector + Surrounded are great if you can live - excellent for farming spawn doors.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Good workhorse Void SMG - unfortunately Demolitionist doesn't grant energy when Volatile kills your target. Good if you don't have The Title, although slow to reload with a small mag.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Surrounded is a very high damage modifier. Fusions are great on targets that are difficult or impossible to crit (Wyverns, Primarily shielded majors, etc.).
data.name: Charge Time Masterwork + Quick Access Sling

data.description: Surrounded is a very high damage modifier. Fusions are great on targets that are difficult or impossible to crit (Wyverns, Primarily shielded majors, etc.).

data.description: Surrounded is a very high damage modifier. Fusions are great on targets that are difficult or impossible to crit (Wyverns, Primarily shielded majors, etc.).
data.name: Charge Time Masterwork + Quick Access Sling

data.description: Great pick for non-crit damage (Wyverns, Primarily shielded majors, etc.). Rewind Rounds on a fusion allows this to be fired almost indefinitely without reloading.
data.name: Charge Time Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Great pick for non-crit damage. Can load all of the reserves into the mag; which would also be alright for add. clear with Reservior Burst (If fusions were ever necessary for add. clear).
data.name: Charge Time Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Another non-crit option. Cascade has higher DPS but considerably lower Total.
data.name: Handling Masterwork + Quick Access Sling

data.description: Another non-crit option. Cascade has higher DPS but considerably lower Total. Could also use One-Two Punch with Strand Melee builds.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Quick Access Sling

data.description: Made for double-slug damage.
data.name: Handling Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Made for double-slug damage.
data.name: Handling Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Excellent DPS for a legendary special. Lacking in total damage.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Workhorse Solar MG - useful for Ember of Empyrean keeping Radiant (Anti-barrier) and Restoration up.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Best legendary sword in the game outside of air animation reset shenanigans.
data.name: Impact Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Solar Auto Rifle for Champion stuns and Solar shields. The only letdown is the weapon type. Stats for All + One for All is a great perk combo in high level content, just remember to quickly tag 3 enemies. Armor-Piercing Rounds enables 1x overpenetration, which helps with activating perks.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Workhorse Void auto. Repulsor Brace and Dragonfly in the left column are uncommon, and solid perks to complement your Void build and Golden Tricorn.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Kinetic Bow for Champion stuns. Precision frame so feels better than Fel Taradiddle, however defer to your preference.
data.name: Draw Time Masterwork + Quick Access Sling

data.description: Arc bow for Champion stuns and Arc shields. Solid replacement for the difficult to obtain Wolftone Draw precision frame.
data.name: Accuracy Masterwork + Quick Access Sling

data.description: Biggest glow up since the HC buff. Feels great now - I'd recommend trying 180s out. Frenzy helps with Voltshot reloads.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Nice void 180 - pairs great with a Gyrfalcon's or Contraverse build. Devour + Demo gets you a grenade refund in 5-7 kills. Armor-Piercing Rounds can apply Volatile to 2 enemies per shot.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Nice void 180 - pairs great with a Gyrfalcon's or Contraverse build. Devour + Demo gets you a grenade refund in 5-7 kills.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Decent offering for an ability heavy build. Not great, but serviceable.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Decent offering for an ability heavy build. Not great, but serviceable.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: When you need a Kinetic slot Scout Rifle, the Perses-D perk pool makes it difficult to use anything else. Let down by the Stasis element. A good Shoot to Loot weapon too.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Workhorse Arc Scout Rifle, although unfortunately downright impossible to obtain without going insane. If you have it, great, if not, just craft a Tarnished Mettle. Armor-piercing Rounds helps to proc One for All.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Workhorse Solar Scout Rifle with an uncommon left column trait - good for keeping long cooldown Solar abilities up in activities where you can't benefit from Ember of Benevolence.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Workhorse Solar Scout Rifle with an uncommon left column trait - good for keeping long cooldown Solar abilities up in activities where you can't benefit from Ember of Benevolence.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Sidearms do a lot of damage base, so even without a damage perk, The Keening does a lot of work (if you can get past the feeling of using a sidearm).
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Sidearms do a lot of damage base, so even without a damage perk, Redback does a lot of work (if you can get past the feeling of using a sidearm).
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Nice feeling Kinetic SMG. Enh. sub isn't as good on SMGs, but the extra damage from Kinetic type weapons allows this Frenzy SMG to compete with Prolonged Engagement.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Nice feeling Kinetic SMG. Enh. sub isn't as good on SMGs, but the extra damage from Kinetic type weapons allows this Frenzy SMG to compete with Prolonged Engagement.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Decent SMG. Regular Subsistence reloads 17% mag, so not much is lost compared to a craftable alternative. One for All's huge damage bonus allows this to barely compete with Kinetic SMGs. Armor-Piercing over-penetration helps with One for All activation.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Great for Void shielded major heavy content (Master Vog entrance), alright for major heavy content too - as fas as fusions go. Only use if you need Void.
data.name: Curated + Quick Access Sling

data.description: Useful if you need a Kinetic Slot wave GL.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Quick Access Sling

data.description: Solar wave GL. Good weapon but hard to argue for this over Forbearance (outside of something like solo Nezerac for your solar buffs).
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Quick Access Sling

data.description: Void wave GL. Good weapon but hard to argue for this over Forbearance.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Quick Access Sling

data.description: Excellent sustain and DPS for a special weapon. Could only be better as a Kinetic.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Decent for ammo economy and solo content due to the ease of Focused Furys' use & uptime. Good as a pair with Apex Predator for Solar Surge also, although Distant Tumulus (or a Solar Slug) would be better.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Good as a Bait and Switch proccing special to min-max damage rotations due to the instant activation of Firing Line. Pretty niche.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: If you need more burst add. clear but your Forbearance won't reload fast enough, try this.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Outdated today but still does great total damage with Fourth Time's the Charm, with the benefit of having an easier to execute 100% crit ratio than Retrofit, with less total damage.
data.name: Handling Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Outdated today but still does great total damage with Fourth Time's the Charm, with the benefit of having an easier to execute 100% crit ratio than Retrofit, with less total damage.
data.name: Handling Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Cataclysmic Liteâ„¢. Probably the most accessible crafted weapon. Precision Linears are good for total damage, but are currently lagging behind Retrofit Escapade.
data.name: Charge Time Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Kinetic Auto Rifle. Stats for All + One for All is a great perk combo in high level content, just remember to quickly tag 3 enemies.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Kinetic Auto Rifle. Stats for All + One for All is a great perk combo in high level content, just remember to quickly tag 3 enemies.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Stasis Auto Rifle. Would be better as a Kinetic, although Veist Stinger helps. Stats for All + One for All is a great perk combo in high level content, just remember to quickly tag 3 enemies.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: An interesting weapon. Sidearms do a lot of damage base, so even without a damage perk, Fioritura does a lot of work (if you can get past the feeling of using a sidearm).
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Useful for grabbing ammo with Shoot to Loot while using kinetic slot primary.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Useful for grabbing ammo with Shoot to Loot while using an energy slot primary. Only craftable Shoot to Loot + Explosive Rounds scout.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Excellent Champion counter weapon. Slow will instantly stun an Overload, Freeze will prevent a Barrier from shielding, Shatter will stun an Unstoppable.
data.name: Charge Time Masterwork + Quick Access Sling

data.description: Excellent blinding Grenade Launcher, but now unobtainable outside Dares. Great for Divinity + 2x Izanagi GM speedruns, or some slideways nonsense with Apex.
data.name: Handling Masterwork + Quick Access Sling

data.description: Excellent blinding Grenade Launcher. Great for Divinity + 2x Izanagi GM speedruns. Fun to use with Slidways weapons (Apex Predator).
data.name: Handling Masterwork + Quick Access Sling

data.description: Excellent blinding Grenade Launcher. Great for Divinity + 2x Izanagi GM speedruns. Fun to use with Slidways weapons (Apex Predator).
data.name: Handling Masterwork + Quick Access Sling

data.description: Energy slot blinding Grenade Launcher.
data.name: Handling Masterwork + Quick Access Sling

data.description: Best pick for an energy GL paired with Izanagi for damage. Good a activating Bait and Switch, although fairly niche.
data.name: Handling Masterwork + Quick Access Sling

data.description: Best Kinetic One-Two Punch shotgun. Highest reserves, great ammo and reload perks.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Quick Access Sling

data.description: Useful if you need to swap to a special weapon mid fight, and also need Shoot to Loot.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Great pick for double special Solar 3.0 builds.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Great pick for double special Void 3.0 builds. Killing Tally isn't a great perk, especially if you swap weapons often, but it's the best Hollow Denial gets.
data.name: Reload Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Useful for Lucent Hive or Tormentor fights, so long as you can get Surrounded to activate (Ecthar, Simmummah, Nezarec). Remember to run 2 other Harmonic Resonance weapons for the 10% boost. Decent DPS with Surrounded & Harmonic Resonance.
data.name: Velocity Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Useful for Lucent Hive or Tormentor fights, so long as you can get Surrounded to activate (Ecthar, Simmummah, Nezarec). Remember to run 2 other Harmonic Resonance weapons for the 10% boost. Decent DPS with Surrounded & Harmonic Resonance.
data.name: Velocity Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Useful for Lucent Hive or Tormentor fights, so long as you can get Surrounded to activate (Ecthar, Simmummah, Nezarec). Remember to run 2 other Harmonic Resonance weapons for the 10% boost. Decent DPS with Surrounded & Harmonic Resonance.
data.name: Charge Time Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Useful for Lucent Hive or Tormentor fights, so long as you can get Surrounded to activate (Ecthar, Simmummah, Nezarec). Remember to run 2 other Harmonic Resonance weapons for the 10% boost. Decent DPS with Surrounded & Harmonic Resonance.
data.name: Charge Time Masterwork + Backup Mag

data.description: Needs no introduction. Used for movement and falling into holes in The Abyss in Crota's End.
data.name: Impact Masterwork + Backup Mag
